Predict sentiment and topic of test data.

Test dataset will be preprocessed and then supplied to predict_sentiment and predict_topic functions.

Parameters:

  • test_filepath (str,optional) ‚Äì filepath of the test dataframe.

  • file (Default is the test file name specified in config) ‚Äì

  • df (pd.DataFrame,optional) ‚Äì test dataframe to predict.

  • data. (Default is the raw train) ‚Äì

Returns:

dataframe with predicted topics and

predicted sentiment

Return type:

df (pd.DataFrame)
